channel.title: Cannot get my client to connect to the server
channel.description: I have been trying to get my client to a point where I can share it with some friends but now I can't even seem to get it connected. I am running the ROME client/source [718]. I would love help over Skype if possible. Skype: chris-finn21 I have been trying to setup a no-ip and my Environment Variables. It is very possible that I have done something wrong there, but I've been at this for hours. Any help would be amazing! Thank you!

item.title: Cannot get my client to connect to the server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I have been trying to get my client to a point where I can share it with some friends but now I can’t even seem to get it connected. I am running the ROME client/source [718].
I would love help over Skype if possible.
Skype: chris-finn21
I have been trying to setup a no-ip and my Environment Variables. It is very possible that I have done something wrong there, but I’ve been at this for hours.
Any help would be amazing! Thank you!
